definition: mutual respect in marriage/abbr. of idiom 舉案齊眉|举案齐眉[ju3 an4 qi2 mei2]
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
lit. to lift the tray to eyebrow level (idiom); mutual respect in a marriage
(of a couple) to grow old together in mutual respect (idiom)

sentences.english: Raise the glass to brow, viewing and admiring the color of wine.
sentences.chinese: 舉杯齊眉，觀賞葡萄酒的色澤。
